title: War against the rabbit
brief_description: Many farmers have relied too much on myxomatosis to control the rabbit. Other measures must also be adopted to completely eradicate the pest. The film describes how a farmer, in collaboration with the Vermin and Noxious Weeds Branch of CSIRO, tackles the problem of completely eradicating rabbits from his property.
